Text:
I've been looking hard for the last issue in this series, "The Dark Tower: The Fall Of Gilead 6 of 6" but have had no luck. I've even managed to find the first issue in the newest series after this one, "The Battle Of Jericho Hill #1" but not the one before it.

If anyone has this issue plz share with us on TPB. It would be most appreciated :)
